title: San Diego/Point Loma-Ocean Beach
name: Sessions Public
directions: at the intersection of Catalina and Voltaire
content: Exceptional gastro pub with excellent food and a unique beer selection. The rib-eye steak fries are excellent. 16 great beers on tap including Belgians, local San Diego craft beers and other worthy selections. They will typically have a cask night each week, check out their website. Happy Hour from 4PM-6:19PM.
